analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Paccuppanno hetu dhammo naatītassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Paccuppanno
analyzed: paccuppannaḥ hetu dhammaḥ na atītassa na hetussa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ paccuppannaḥ

original: hetu dhammo naanāgatassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Paccuppanno hetu
analyzed: hetu dhammaḥ na anāgatassa na hetussa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ paccuppannaḥ hetu

original: dhammo naatītassa nahetussa ca naanāgatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
analyzed: dhammaḥ na atītassa na hetussa ca na anāgatassa na hetussa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena

original: paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha, anantare tīṇi
analyzed: paccayo saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā cha anantare tīṇi
pe sahajāte tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
